title: Ranked queues should be enabled at 4am
body: Its been how long since we have had it disabled from 4 to 8? Isn't it about time we at least try out it being enabled for 2 weeks. Some people are early risers and some people are nightowls, they should be allowed to play ranked when ever they want to.

replies.body: Have you seen how imbalanced the normals usually are at these times? Would be even harder to get decent matchmaking in ranked. Its disabled for a reason
Norms are always unbalanced for me no matter the time of day.
You know you're on a massive tilt if you're still trying to get a win at 4 am

Nar i just don't like unranked when im not playing with friends and unranked is usually way more toxic than ranked. 

Playing ranked and climbing the ladder is fun for me and i would assume many others. It gives you a goal to grind and work for.

they havent been getting disabled past few nights. i dont know if that is intentional or not, but i was queueing up for ranked past 5am last night.

and no, for the vast majority of players it would not be hard to find a match. i had no difficulty finding a match with 9 other people in my elo. now i would assume it is different for high elo players, but even at the best times, the higher elo you are, the longer it takes to find a match. it shouldnt be disabled just because of a handful of players when there are many more that could play.

Yeah i just noticed about 5 hrs after i posted this thread ranked stayed open. Maybe its a weekend thing? Or maybe rito seen my post? 

But yeah you sum it up pretty well. It shouldn't be disabled cause of a handful of players have to wait longer to find a game. This was only a real problen when the server was new, OCE has a good amount of players now for a game in OCE. I was able to find games from 4 to 8 just fine. Queue time was only 1 and a half minutes longer than usual and it was k. I had fun and i didn't have to play unranked.
